definition: to go to prison/to be imprisoned

sentences.english: Flame Prison is an elementalist off-hand dagger skill.
sentences.chinese: 烈焰牢狱是元素使副手匕首技能。

sentences.english: McCain had his fortitude forged by fire in a prison camp; he throbs with an energy of someone who has never stopped making up for lost time.
sentences.chinese: 麦凯恩有一种在牢狱中淬炼出的坚毅。

sentences.english: Bush is in no danger of going to a Swiss jail, obviously.
sentences.chinese: 当然，布什大可放心，他在瑞士是不会有牢狱之虞的。

sentences.english: He spent ten years behind bars after being convicted for armed robbery.
sentences.chinese: 在被判持械抢劫罪后，他度过了十年牢狱生活。

sentences.english: Kevin was playing a 12)pedophile who is released from jail.
sentences.chinese: 凯文扮演了一个刑满释放的恋童癖，饱受牢狱之苦。

sentences.english: But that creativity ultimately led to his captivity and death.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个创造性最终导致了他的牢狱之灾和死亡。

sentences.english: You lock yourself in the prison that you make for yourself.
sentences.chinese: 你把自己锁在自己造就的牢狱中。

sentences.english: In 1990, after 27 years in prison, Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela was finally released.
sentences.chinese: 1990年，过了27年牢狱生活的曼德拉出狱了。

sentences.english: ROSENCRANTZ Then is the world one.
sentences.chinese: 那么世界也是一所牢狱。

sentences.english: For his ideas and actions, he went to jail for a short time.
sentences.chinese: 由于他的头脑和举动，曾蹲过短工夫的牢狱。

sentences.english: Her sense of self was worth more than the years in prison to her.
sentences.chinese: 她的自我形象之于她，远远比坐几年的牢狱更有价值。

sentences.english: Homosexuality is illegal, punishable by jail time, in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 在利比亚，同性恋是非法的，要处以牢狱之刑。

sentences.english: And in the dungeon there was no water, but mire: so Jeremiah sunk in the mire.
sentences.chinese: 牢狱里没有水，只有淤泥，耶利米就陷在淤泥中。

sentences.english: He had strong beliefs against racism and went to prison for his people.
sentences.chinese: 他反对种族主义，为了他的人民他曾饱尝牢狱之苦。

sentences.english: Surely the grace which enabled thee to sing praises under such suffering is all-sufficient grace.
sentences.chinese: 你靠着恩典还能在受苦的牢狱中唱出赞美来。

sentences.english: She could still face a trial and prison time.
sentences.chinese: 她可能还会面临审判和牢狱之刑。

definition: all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
to go to jail/to be sent to prison
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
window with an iron grating (apartment etc)/barred window of a prison cell
